Class TargetedAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • vooga.towerdefense.action.Action

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApplyAttributeBuff, FilterTargets, FindTargets, LaunchProjectile, ModifyAttributeValue, ModifyFactoryAttribute, MoveToTarget, OnCollision, PeriodicAction

    public abstract class TargetedAction
extends Action
    Actions that require a target or multiple targets.
